channel.title: I am thinking of doing a power miner
channel.description:
I want to do a power miner with these features.
1)Random event handler 2)Lvl up rock change(If level is sufficient)
Now, what I want to ask is: (Noobiest questions first) 1/2)If I piece together parts from tutorials does it count as my own script or must I have typed every single word myself? 1)Do I have to press "Download includes" if I already have SRL? 2)How do I make something walk to an area, say from falador bank to the mine? 3)How do I declare randoms?
Thanks for all the help, I'm trying to make this first script a sucess.

In short, does it mean “Yes, it is prewritten in SRL” or “Yes, you have to do it yourself”/?

item.title: I am thinking of doing a power miner
item.dc:creator: @the_one1 the one
item.description:
@the_one1 wrote:

You see, in martijntjuh’s powermining script,some things like find gass and find pick, are the handlers already built into SRL?
PS what if you find other randoms such as the sandwich lady, is there a built in handler or you have to do it yourself?
[scar]
procedure FFight;
var x,y,prevcount,b,a:integer;
begin
if (FindFight) then
begin
Writeln(‘Found Fight’);
RunAwayDirection(‘N’);
Writeln(‘running away!’);
Wait(8000 + random(3000));
RunBack;
end;
FindPick;
FindGas(a, b);
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
OpenBox;
wait(1000);
GambleNewBox;
wait(1000);
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
OpenBox;
wait(1000);
GambleNewBox;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
LogOut;
Writeln(‘Unable To Solve Box…Terminating’);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;[/scar]

Read full topic

When the script says Find something,(Randoms),is the way the script handles the random already written in the SRL library unless stated otherwise?

item.title: I am thinking of doing a power miner
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

have a look at them, alot easier. look thru SRL

edit: heres a bit of help

procedure FindNormalRandoms;
By: The SRL Developers Team!.. all time sexiness by Mutant
Description:
Calls the ‘normal’ random checks.

procedure SRLRandomsReport;
By: Dankness
Description:
Displays Randoms Report.

function FindMod: Boolean;
By:
Description:
Results True if a mod is found, then it waits 10-20 mins and logs back in

function FindFight: Boolean;
By:
Description:
Results True if in Fight

Read full topic

item.title: I am thinking of doing a power miner
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“the one, post:1, topic:13617”]I want to do a power miner with these features.

1)Random event handler
2)Lvl up rock change(If level is sufficient)

Now, what I want to ask is:
(Noobiest questions first)
1/2)If I piece together parts from tutorials does it count as my own script or must I have typed every single word myself?
1)Do I have to press “Download includes” if I already have SRL?
2)How do I make something walk to an area, say from falador bank to the mine?
3)How do I declare randoms?

Thanks for all the help, I’m trying to make this first script a sucess.[/quote]

1/2) yes, its your very own leeched script lol.

  1. no but its reccomended
  2. MMouse(x,y,20,20); ClickMouse(x,y,true);
  3. Learn how the random handlers work first

Read full topic
